channel.title: Need help with this... Rep+
channel.description:
Ok, I fixed my issue with the attacking (sorry if the person answer it and I didn't reply on MoparScape). But now I'm getting this error:
[code][7/4/11 9:30 PM]: java.lang.NullPointerException [7/4/11 9:30 PM]: at server.model.players.CombatAssistant.checkReqs(CombatAssistant.java:2461) [7/4/11 9:30 PM]: at server.model.players.packets.AttackPlayer.processPacket(AttackPlayer.java:120) [7/4/11 9:30 PM]: at server.model.players.PacketHandler.processPacket(PacketHandler.java:138) [7/4/11 9:30 PM]: at server.model.players.Client.processQueuedPackets(Client.java:1258) [7/4/11 9:30 PM]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:136) [7/4/11 9:30 PM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:159)[/code]
This doesn't shut off the server or anything its just annoying and I don't know if with a bunch of people online, if it will shut off or not. Thanks for help in advance!

soz my brain is spacing out today i could not spell so i was not gonna attempt to help lol

item.title: Need help with this... Rep+
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]I just don’t get why you added all that.

if (inWild() && !isInBattleField()) { int modY = absY > 6400 ? absY - 6400 : absY; wildLevel = (((modY - 3520) / 8) + 1); getPA().walkableInterface(197); if (Configuration.SINGLE_AND_MULTI_ZONES) { if (inMulti()) { getPA().sendFrame126("@yel@Level: " + wildLevel, 199); } else { getPA().sendFrame126("@yel@Level: " + wildLevel, 199); } } else { getPA().multiWay(-1); getPA().sendFrame126("@yel@Level: " + wildLevel, 199); } getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Attack", 1); } else if (isInBattleField()) { wildLevel = 300; getPA().walkableInterface(197); if (Configuration.SINGLE_AND_MULTI_ZONES) { if (inMulti()) { getPA().sendFrame126("@yel@Level: " + wildLevel, 199); } else { getPA().sendFrame126("@yel@Level: " + wildLevel, 199); } } else { getPA().multiWay(-1); getPA().sendFrame126("@yel@Level: " + wildLevel, 199); } }??[/quote]I have it all working and shit, it just spits those errors at me when i try to attack a team mate :L. I’ll post that code tomorrow since I have that on my pc and I’m on my iPod. This code that the line is on is making it so you can attack at any level. It only started when I put in the Sara couldn’t attk Sara and zamy can’t attack zamy.

And what the he’ll are you talking about lube for?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with this... Rep+
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

if(Config.COMBAT_LEVEL_DIFFERENCE && !Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerIndex].isInBattleField()) {

I think it’s cause of this at the top though:

if (c.isInBattleField()) { c.wildLevel = 300; }

Ish I right? :o

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with this... Rep+
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

[code] public boolean checkReqs() {
if (c.isInBattleField()) {
c.wildLevel = 300;
}
if(Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerIndex] == null) {
return false;
}
if (c.playerIndex == c.playerId)
return false;
if (c.inPits && Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerIndex].inPits)
return true;
if(Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerIndex].inDuelArena() && c.duelStatus != 5 && !c.usingMagic) {
if(c.arenas() || c.duelStatus == 5) {
c.sendMessage(“You can’t challenge inside the arena!”);
return false;
}
c.getTradeAndDuel().requestDuel(c.playerIndex);
return false;
}
if(c.duelStatus == 5 && Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerIndex].duelStatus == 5) {
if(Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerIndex].duelingWith == c.getId()) {
return true;
} else {
c.sendMessage(“This isn’t your opponent!”);
return false;
}
}
if(!Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerIndex].inWild()) {
c.sendMessage(“That player is not in the wilderness.”);
c.stopMovement();
c.getCombat().resetPlayerAttack();
return false;
}
if(Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerIndex].isInPVPSafe()) {
c.sendMessage(“That player is in a safe zone!”);
c.stopMovement();
c.getCombat().resetPlayerAttack();
return false;
}
if(c.isInPVPSafe()) {
c.sendMessage(“You cannot attack other players in a safe zone!”);
c.stopMovement();
c.getCombat().resetPlayerAttack();
return false;
}
if(c.isInBattleField() && c.isSara == 1 && Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerIndex].isSara == 1 ) {
c.sendMessage(“Why would you wan’t to attack someone on your team?”);
c.stopMovement();
c.getCombat().resetPlayerAttack();
}
if(!c.isInBattleField() && c.isZamy == 1 && Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerIndex].isZamy == 1) {
c.sendMessage(“Why would you wan’t to attack someone on your team?”);
c.stopMovement();
c.getCombat().resetPlayerAttack();
}
if(!c.inWild()) {
c.sendMessage(“You are not in the wilderness.”);
c.stopMovement();
c.getCombat().resetPlayerAttack();
return false;
}
if(Config.COMBAT_LEVEL_DIFFERENCE && !Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerIndex].isInBattleField()) {
int combatDif1 = c.getCombat().getCombatDifference(c.combatLevel, Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerIndex].combatLevel);
if(combatDif1 > c.wildLevel || combatDif1 > Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerIndex].wildLevel) {
c.sendMessage(“Your combat level difference is too great to attack that player here.”);
c.stopMovement();
c.getCombat().resetPlayerAttack();
return false;
}
}

	if(Config.SINGLE_AND_MULTI_ZONES) {
		if(!Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerIndex].inMulti()) {	// single combat zones
			if(Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerIndex].underAttackBy != c.playerId  && Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerIndex].underAttackBy != 0) {
				c.sendMessage("That player is already in combat.");
				c.stopMovement();
				c.getCombat().resetPlayerAttack();
				return false;
			}
			if(Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerIndex].playerId != c.underAttackBy && c.underAttackBy != 0 || c.underAttackBy2 > 0) {
				c.sendMessage("You are already in combat.");
				c.stopMovement();
				c.getCombat().resetPlayerAttack();
				return false;
			}
		}
	}
	return true;
}

[/code]

item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

Ok, I fixed my issue with the attacking (sorry if the person answer it and I didn’t reply on MoparScape). But now I’m getting this error:

[7/4/11 9:30 PM]: java.lang.NullPointerException [7/4/11 9:30 PM]: at server.model.players.CombatAssistant.checkReqs(CombatAssistant.java:2461) [7/4/11 9:30 PM]: at server.model.players.packets.AttackPlayer.processPacket(AttackPlayer.java:120) [7/4/11 9:30 PM]: at server.model.players.PacketHandler.processPacket(PacketHandler.java:138) [7/4/11 9:30 PM]: at server.model.players.Client.processQueuedPackets(Client.java:1258) [7/4/11 9:30 PM]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:136) [7/4/11 9:30 PM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:159)

This doesn’t shut off the server or anything its just annoying and I don’t know if with a bunch of people online, if it will shut off or not. Thanks for help in advance!
